Medical Treatment

For Patients , Docfully can supplement your primary care physician visits.

For Clinicians , Docfully is a valuable resource to increase the number of patients you see and improve patient engagement.

Virtual Examinations

By having weekly virtual videoconferencing visits as part of a preventative care package, Docfully can enhance the patient experience with a clinician. And clinicians can get a better understanding of the patient’s environment through the virtual videoconferencing visit.

Non-Emergency Care

Docfully is an alternative to emergency rooms, urgent care facilities, and healthcare clinics for non-emergency services.

Our Services

Docfully is a telemedicine service that caters to the elderly, disabled, low income, and homeless to improve health outcomes for these individuals through these services.

  • Wellness Exams

    Performed with an on premise Medical Assistant, these exams are done through our videoconferencing system and data collection.

  • Pain Management

    Experienced clinicians can help find traditional and alternative ways to manage pain.

  • Health Screenings

    Quick assessments for job, school, transitional care, or travel requirements.

  • Alcohol and substance abuse Assessment

    Clinicians can help asses patients with alcohol/substance abuse while helping manage their medications.

  • Diabetes Education

    Through screenings and virtual visits Docfully can help clinicians educate and manage diabetic patients.

  • Smoking Cessation

    Docfully can help clinicians create a program to decrease nicotine consumption.

WHO WE ARE

We are the solution to long trips to the hospital or doctor’s office for a routine checkup. We are the means to receive preventative healthcare service instead of reactionary medicine by urgent care facilities and Minute Clinics. We are the provider of affordable concierge healthcare service through the use of technology, and caring, screened health professionals on a secured platform.

OUR HISTORY

Docfully started as an idea.”Docfully puts patients first – and puts your mind at ease as we work with you to coordinate care”.Through this motto we will build the foundation of our company. Incorporated in the Fall of 2015 “Docfully” as a company will serve to put the patient first, and your mind at ease when it comes to your family’s healthcare.
